name: Roncesvalles Polish Festival
description:
The Roncesvalles Village BIA welcomes back their annual festival in September!

North America's largest celebration of Polish culture. Enjoy great local and international music, including Polish folklore, Polka and Euro dance bands, family fun zones, as well as entertainment from near and far on 3 stages!

name: Community Environment Day at Sir Casimir Gzowski Park
description:
Join Councillor Perks (Ward 4) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free loose compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted). Please bring a container to pick up loose compost.

name: Greek Life in the West End Walking Tour

location.name: Start Point - Northeast corner of Bloor Street West and Russett Avenue

description: Before Greektown on the Danforth, Bloor Street West used to be the hub of Greek life in Toronto during the 1950s and 1960s. With a focus on the working lives of Greek immigrants, we’ll recreate the neighbourhood that welcomed new immigrants and allowed them to function in their new country but still speak Greek and shop in places familiar to them.

name: Ignited By Books Author Event

location.name: Delta Hotels Toronto Airport and Conference Centre

description: A non-profit book signing with over 50 signing Canadian and International authors in a variety of different genres, there's something for every book lover. We will have a silent auction with proceeds going to support Fred Victor, an amazing local charity organization that fosters long-lasting, positive change in the lives of Toronto citizens facing the challenges of low income and homelessness.

name: Toronto New Home and Condo Expo

location.name: Metro Toronto Convention Centre North Building - Room 205 and 206

description:
Whether you're a first-time homebuyer or looking to upgrade, or downsize, your search for the perfect new construction home just became more convenient. This is a two-day weekend event that brings together top builders and developers from the Greater Toronto-area.

Discover a wide range of new Toronto homes and condos, explore communities built for your lifestyle, get design inspired, and meet mortgage experts, and real estate legal professionals all in one location.
